context_script:
# Helper to build resized image URLs
def simple_resized_url(original_url, doctype_folder, size_label):
    if not original_url:
        return None
    filename = original_url.split("/")[-1]
    base_name = ".".join(filename.split(".")[:-1])
    resized_filename = f"{size_label}_{base_name}.jpg"
    return f"/files/gallery_resized/{doctype_folder}/{resized_filename}"

# Get root-level school node (top of nested set)
context.school = frappe.get_all(
    "School",
    filters={"is_group": 1},
    fields=["name"],
    order_by="lft asc",
    limit_page_length=1
)[0]
context.school = frappe.get_doc("School", context.school.name)

# Process gallery images for hero carousel
for img in context.school.gallery_image:
	if img.school_image:
		img.resized_school_image_small = simple_resized_url(img.school_image, "school", "small")
		img.resized_school_image_medium = simple_resized_url(img.school_image, "school", "medium")
		img.resized_school_image_large = simple_resized_url(img.school_image, "school", "large")

{% if img.caption %}

{% endif %}
{% endif %} {% endfor %}
{% endif %} {% if school.school_tagline %}

{% endif %}
name: home
title: Home

context_script:
# Helper: Build resized image URL for WebP strategy (slugified inline)
def smart_resized_url(original_url, doctype_folder, size_label):
    if not original_url:
        return None

    # extract filename without path or extension
    filename = original_url.split("/")[-1]
    base = filename.rsplit(".", 1)[0]

    # slugify doctype_folder and base: lowercase ‚Üí alnum else '_' ‚Üí strip '_' 
    folder_slug = "".join(ch if ch.isalnum() else "_" for ch in doctype_folder.lower()).strip("_")
    file_slug   = "".join(ch if ch.isalnum() else "_" for ch in base.lower()).strip("_")

    return f"/files/gallery_resized/{folder_slug}/{size_label}_{file_slug}.webp"


# Fetch school
school_slug = frappe.form_dict.name
school = frappe.get_doc("School", {"website_slug": school_slug})
context.school = school

# Process gallery images (carousel)
for img in context.school.gallery_image:
    if img.school_image:
        img.resized_school_image_card = smart_resized_url(img.school_image, "school", "card")
        img.resized_school_image_medium = smart_resized_url(img.school_image, "school", "medium")
        img.resized_school_image_hero   = smart_resized_url(img.school_image, "school", "hero")

# Leadership team (round image cards)
context.leaders = frappe.get_all(
    "Employee",
    filters={
        "school": school.name,
        "department": "Academic Leadership",
        "show_on_website": 1
    },
    fields=["employee_full_name", "employee_image", "designation", "small_bio"],
    order_by="modified desc"
)

for leader in context.leaders:
    if leader.employee_image:
        leader.resized_employee_image_card = smart_resized_url(leader.employee_image, "employee", "card")

# Academic staff (carousel)
context.academic_staff = frappe.get_all(
    "Employee",
    filters={
        "school": school.name,
        "show_on_website": 1,
        "department": ["!=", "Academic Leadership"]
    },
    fields=["employee_full_name", "employee_image", "designation", "small_bio"],
    order_by="modified desc"
)

for person in context.academic_staff:
    if person.employee_image:
        person.resized_employee_image_card = smart_resized_url(person.employee_image, "employee", "card")

# Academic programs (card blocks)
context.programs = frappe.get_all(
    "Program",
    filters={
        "school": school.name,
        "is_published": 1,
        "is_featured": 1,
        "is_group": 1
    },
    fields=[
        "name",
        "program_name",
        "program_image",
        "description"
    ],
    order_by="is_featured desc, program_name asc",
    limit_page_length=6
)

for prog in context.programs:
    prog.resized_program_image_card = smart_resized_url(prog.program_image, "program", "card")
    prog.resized_program_image_thumb = smart_resized_url(prog.program_image, "program", "thumb")
    prog.description = prog.description or ""
